name: MIS DARU National Key Worker Sessions
description:
The report provides a list of offenders with Key Worker Session case notes entered at each Establishment in a date range. The report can be run for one, multiple or All establishments, and provides a total number of offenders with a case note, not a number of individual case notes.
HQ0020

dataset.name: Case note
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT SAC.CASELOAD_ID FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC WHERE SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_OFF_CASE_NOTE.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-06-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('30-06-3019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE = 'KS')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
